pull.title: Tests: Fix running wallet_listtransactions.py individually through test_runner.py

events.body: `(en|dis)able_mocktime` is now only used for the `create_cache` util function. Mind inlining it there to make sure it is not called from the outside again?

events.message: Fix running individually through test_runner.py, as suggested by @MarcoFalke (#14732)

rename.from: Fix running wallet_listtransactions.py individually through test_runner.py
rename.to: Tests: Fix running wallet_listtransactions.py individually through test_runner.py

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -451,14 +434,24 @@ def _initialize_chain(self):
             for node in self.nodes:
                 node.wait_for_rpc_connection()
 
+            # Enable mocktime for the script.
+            #
+            # mocktime may be needed for scripts that use the cached version of the
+            # blockchain.  If the cached version of the blockchain is used without
+            # mocktime then the mempools will not sync due to IBD.
+            #
+            # For backward compatibility of the python scripts with previous
+            # versions of the cache, this helper function sets mocktime to Jan 1,
comments.body:
```suggestion
            # versions of the cache, set mocktime to Jan 1,
```

@@ -371,23 +371,6 @@ def sync_all(self, node_groups=None):
             sync_blocks(group)
             sync_mempools(group)
 
-    def enable_mocktime(self):
-        """Enable mocktime for the script.
-
-        mocktime may be needed for scripts that use the cached version of the
-        blockchain.  If the cached version of the blockchain is used without
-        mocktime then the mempools will not sync due to IBD.
-
-        For backward compatibility of the python scripts with previous
-        versions of the cache, this helper function sets mocktime to Jan 1,
-        2014 + (201 * 10 * 60)"""
-        self.mocktime = 1388534400 + (201 * 10 * 60)
-
-    def disable_mocktime(self):
-        self.mocktime = 0
-
-    # Private helper methods. These should not be accessed by the subclass test scripts.
